entry.title: 360-Degree Rotating Makeup Organizer
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 56.99

Product Description:

Keep your vanity table free of mess with this creative makeup organizer which rotates 360 degrees.

  • Has a large capacity
  • Can hold up to 30 makeup brushes, 20 skincare products, and other accessories
  • Durable and scratch resistance
  • Convenient to assemble
  • Washable

How to Use:

Step 1: Insert one of the partitions into the base plate, then insert the other.
Step 2: Immobilize the 4 bottom joints with rubber rings.
Step 3: Insert the roof into the partitions.
Step 4: Insert the 4 trays into partition slots, according to your needs. Then immobilize all the joints with rubber rings.

Specifications:

Material: Plastic
Plastic Type: PS
Type: Organizer
Size: 30*30*20
Color: White, Black, Pink

Include:

1x Roof
1x Base Plate
4x Trays
2x Partitions
8x Rubber Rings

Note:

Please allow 1-3cm measuring deviation due to manual measurement.

entry.title: FlexiZoom‚Ñ¢ 10x Magnifying LED Lighted Mirror
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 39.99

Product Description:

Don't you wish your mirror can also zoom in just like your phone camera, so you can get that perfect angle to do your makeup? Consider your wish granted with FlexiZoom‚Ñ¢ 10x Magnifying LED Lighted Mirror!

Doing your own makeup has never been this easy! FlexiZoom‚Ñ¢ 10x Magnifying LED Lighted Mirror is just your regular vanity mirror!

10x magnification feature - allows you to see specific parts of your face! It can even make tweezing, shaving, putting your contact lenses, doing your makeup, or simply locking your accessories more convenient!

¬†

Built-in LED ring light - providing natural soft light helping you see much clearer day and night with ON and OFF switch!

360¬∞ Rotating function - it is fully adjustable! It allows you to position it in any way you wish!

Stronghold suction cup - also, this mirror comes with locking suction that provides stable and secure locking support so you can place it on your vanity mirror, table, desk, or even on your window!

Adjustable Gooseneck design - for added convenience, this mirror features bendable and adjustable gooseneck so you can adjust it depending on your height for perfect viewing!

¬†

How to Use:

To use FlexiZoom‚Ñ¢ 10x Magnifying LED Lighted Mirror, all you need to do is follow these simple and easy steps!

Step 1: Clean the surface where you wish to place the FlexiZoom‚Ñ¢ 10x Magnifying LED Lighted Mirror

Step 2: After cleaning, place the mirror facing the suction cup against the surface and twist the lock going clockwise.

Step 3: For additional comfort, bend the gooseneck depending on your preference!

*Please insert 3 pieces AAA battery to use the LED ring light

¬†

Specification:

Material: ABS + silver mirror

Size: 200mm x 220 mm x 300 mm

Gooseneck Lenght: 26cm

Power input: 3PCS AAA battery powered

OrgaNice‚Ñ¢ 6-Large-Pockets Hanging Handbag Organizer not only keeps your handbags in an organized way but it can also prevent wear and tear due to dust.

Unlike when storing your handbags in the closet or on top of your cabinet, this handbag organizer can be a space-saving tool given that it can be hanged on one corner of your room or back door.

entry.title: KeepMe‚Ñ¢ Travel Bra Storage Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 18.99

Product Description:

Bras are undergarments that keep your bust in shape, especially if you're wearing fitted clothes. But isn't it frustrating to have to wear bras that have already deformed due to improper way of washing or storing it? This can be avoided with the help of our KeepMe‚Ñ¢ Travel Bra Storage Case!

KeepMe‚Ñ¢ Travel Bra Storage Case is specially made for keeping and storing your bras without deforming its shape given it has an elegant bra-like case that fits any sizes of a bra, from smallest to largest.

This bra storage case not only adds a sense of fashion to your closet but also makes it easier to find and choose what bra to wear, especially when you're in a hurry.

In addition to bras, KeepMe‚Ñ¢ Travel Bra Storage Case is also ideal in storing underwear, lingerie, and other small accessories. Thus, making it great for either at-home storage or traveling.

  • Protects your bras from getting deformed
  • Perfect wardrobe organizer
  • Comes in a variety of designs
  • Fits in your handbag
  • Easy to carry

¬†

How to Use:

Step 1: Unzip the bra case.

Step 2: Place your bras inside, as well as your other undergarments and accessories.

Step 3: Zip the bra case and place it inside your wardrobe or suitcase.
